Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • Core

  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the core class. This class is responsible for keeping the state of the game as well as asking each AI for its input.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Core(java.util.Collection<HumanPlayer> humanPlayers)
      Creates a new game core
